snippet.title: Crystals Of Irm -  Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
Crystals Of Irm is an retro inspired rpg with quirky graphics in development. Explore the land of Irm, gather a group of heros and solve the mystery of the crystals. May the crystals shine for you!


Follow on itch.io and read the weekly dev log
https://lots-of-stuff.itch.io/crystalsofirm


Follow on Gamejolt 
https://gamejolt.com/games/crystalsofirm/608377

Music made by https://soundcloud.com/fauni_music
Twitter @lofsgames
